fields.description:
The wardrobe can be installed in the bedroom as a fixed piece of furniture. Alternatively, the cabinet may be a separate, movable piece of furniture.

In a smaller bedroom, choosing wardrobes often feels awkward. The best option is often a built-in wardrobe where you can choose the dimensions according to your space. Another option is to choose a smaller, 1-2-door, free-standing wardrobe.

The separate wardrobe has to be moved if necessary (although it should always be attached to the wall) and can even be quite an eye-catcher in the bedroom. In our selection, you will also find wardrobes with mirrored doors , which add a sense of space and style to the room.
fields.title: Bedroom cabinets - fixed furniture or movable furniture?
